name: Cyber Attack (itch) (Traven396)
description:
A programming student gets sucked into his computer one day, never heard that setup before have you. He must make it through all the languages he learned and reach the end zone or else.

This game was made for a  school project, and I am uploading it here so that it might be immortalized on the internet. As everyone must play this game, its life changing, I met my wife through this game, I was conceived to this game, how does that even work? To quote Todd Howard, "It just works," and we will leave it at that.

The game functions similarly to Worlds Hardest Game, the old flash one. Hitting any enemy will immediately send you back to the start of the level, so be careful!
